=== Greetings ===

This is the roadmap for Edubuntu 12.04 LTS (Precise Pangolin)

* Blueprint: https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/community-p-edubuntu
* Release Schedule: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PrecisePangolin/ReleaseSchedule

=== Roadmap ===

<pre>

[x] Get Epoptes in to Debian + Ubuntu archives
</pre>
